trans-unit.source: Represents the XPath transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: 表示根據 W3C 所定義之數位簽章的 XPath 轉換。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class allows you to address an XML document using the XPath language.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別可讓您解決使用 XPath 語言的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This class uses an XPath expression to select the XML nodes you want to sign or encrypt while removing all others from either cryptographic operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用 XPath 運算式，以選取您想要簽署或加密任一密碼編譯作業中移除所有其他的 XML 節點。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>來簽署或加密的 XML 文件使用 XPath 運算式的特定部分的類別。

trans-unit.source: For information on initializing the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class to the value of an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別 XPath 轉換字串的值，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: 描述統一資源識別元 (URI)<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別由定義<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl>欄位。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XPath transform, see Section 6.6.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 XPath 轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱 6.6.3 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何簽署與驗證 XML 文件使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>信封簽章的類別。

trans-unit.source: This example signs an XML document and saves the signature in a new XML document.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會簽署 XML 文件，並將簽章儲存在新的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to call members of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例示範如何呼叫的成員<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: **Example #1**
**Example #2**
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何簽署與驗證 XML 文件使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example creates an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立信封簽章。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件參數的 XML 表示，此物件適合納入為 XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> 項目的子項目。

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object in an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: XML 節點的清單，代表 XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> 項目中描述目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件所需要的轉換特定內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件的輸出。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件，其中包含 XPath 轉換的 XML 表示法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件，其中包含 XPath 轉換的 XML 表示法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve the output of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A>方法來擷取目前的輸出<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>物件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的輸出型別。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 是這個參數唯一有效的型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別為 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 之目前 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 物件的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 之目前 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 物件的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件，其中包含 XPath 轉換的 XML 表示法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve the output of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A>方法來擷取目前的輸出<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>物件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 參數不是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別陣列，其為目前 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 方法的有效輸入。

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件的有效輸入型別陣列；您可以只將其中一種型別的物件傳遞到目前 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的輸入類型，以<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>是<xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> property to retrieve the valid input types for the current transform.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A>屬性，以擷取目前的轉換為有效的輸入型別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要載入至目前 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object as transform-specific content of a <see langword="<Transform>" /> element and configures the internal state of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object to match the <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> 物件剖析為 <see langword="<Transform>" /> 項目的轉換特定內容，並將目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件的內部狀態設定成與 <see langword="<Transform>" /> 項目相符。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method to initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>方法來初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>使用 XPath 轉換的類別。

trans-unit.source: To initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform, complete the following steps.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>使用 XPath 轉換類別中，完成下列步驟。

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> class and set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property to the value of an XPath transform string.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>類別並設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>屬性為 XPath 轉換字串的值。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that represents the transform.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>表示轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class and pass the previously created <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別，並將先前建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何簽署與驗證 XML 文件使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: This sample creates an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立信封簽章。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nodeList" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter does not contain an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nodeList" /> 參數不包含 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要載入至目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的輸入載入目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A> method to initialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object to the value of an XPath transform using an <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A>方法來初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>XPath 轉換使用的值物件<xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>物件。

trans-unit.source: For information about initializing an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object using an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需初始化資訊<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>物件使用的 XPath 轉換字串，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入物件的類型必須是其中一個類型中<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A> method using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object as the input.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A>方法使用指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>物件做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可以從目前 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 方法輸出的型別陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object; the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object return only objects of one of these types.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 物件的有效輸出型別陣列；目前 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> 方法只會傳回其中一種型別的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> 是唯一有效的輸出類型<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.OutputTypes%2A> property to retrieve the valid output types for the current transform.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.OutputTypes%2A>屬性，以擷取目前的轉換的有效的輸出類型。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別。
